title: Characters
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology)/ [How-To](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/How-To) : Characters**

Discussion and Design information about specific characters. Terms in parentheses denote PostScript names, when they differ from common names. Actual samples of character in question are shown in brackets.

[aesc](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/aesc) (AE, ae) [Æ, æ]  
 [ampersand](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ampersand) [&]  
 [aringacute](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/aringacute) [Ǻ, ǻ]  
 [at](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/at) [@]  
 [cent](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/cent) [¢]  
 [currency](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/currency) [¤]  
 [dollar sign](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/dollar%20sign) (dollar) [$]  
 [eng](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/eng) [Ŋ, ŋ]  
 [eszett](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/eszett) (germandbls) [ß]  
 [eth](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/eth) [Ð, ð]  
 [ethel](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ethel) (OE, oe) [Œ, œ]  
 [fist](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/fist) [☞]  
 [florin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/florin) [ƒ]  
 [hedera](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/hedera)  
 [interrobang](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/interrobang) [‽]  
 [kra](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/kra) (kgreenlandic) [ĸ]  
 [l dot](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/l%20dot) [Ŀ, ŀ]  
 [l slash](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/l%20slash) (lslash) [ł]  
 [rupiah](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/rupiah) (Rp, Indonesian currency)  
 [space](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/space)  
 [yen](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014081527/http:/typophile.com/wiki/yen) [¥]
author: Miguel Sousa
